com.vividsolutions.jcs.geom
Class GeometryEditor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.vividsolutions.jcs.geom.GeometryEditor
public class GeometryEditor
extends java.lang.Object

Geometry objects are unmodifiable; this class allows you to "modify" a Geometry in a sense -- the modified Geometry is returned as a new Geometry. The new Geometry's #isValid should be checked.

Inner Class Summary
static class GeometryEditor.CoordinateOperation
          Modifies the coordinates of a Geometry which contains a single coordinate list.
